# [Interview #1162: Shadows of Self-San Jose, Entry #42](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1162#42)

#### Question

What happens if you burn atium at the same time as cadmium or bendalloy?

#### Brandon Sanderson

That would be really cool to see.
